delete_ad_subtitle: Warning: Are you sure you want to delete AD?
delete_ad_text: Your Ad will be permenently removed and you won't be able to see them again, including the once you're shared with your friends.
testimonial_1: I liked your quick response and cooperation. Your account is well organized and beautifully designed. I was impressed by the clear adoption details for each pet. üíì
testimonial_2: Excellent and fast service, Mashallah. I thank you for it and for your cooperation and support. May Allah reward you with goodness. üëçü§ç
testimonial_3: Thank you so much, Pets Helpful, for the quick publication of the adoption ads I sent to you. Your approach and presentation of adoption cases are very beautiful. May Allah reward you abundantly. üíïüíï
about_text: Welcome to our pets ads marketplace website, where you can connect with pet owners and enthusiasts from around the world! Our platform is dedicated to providing a safe and user-friendly environment for individuals to buy, sell, and adopt pets of all types.
how_much_advertising_fees: How much are the advertising fees?
how_to_post_ad: How to post an ad on the website?
post_ad_instruction: You can post an ad from the homepage by clicking the 'Post Ad' button.
modify_or_delete_ad: Can the ad be modified or deleted?
modify_or_delete_ad_answer: Yes, you can modify or delete the ad through the ad settings.
types_of_ads: What types of ads are there?
types_of_ads_list: Temporary adoption, Mating, Free rescue, Sale, Adoption
error404_text: It will be as simple as Occidental in fact, it will be Occidental
signup_subheading: Sign Up and get access to all the features of Pets HelpFul
signin_subheading: Sign in to continue to Pets HelpFul.
reset_password_subheading: Reset your password with Pets HelpFul.
reset_password_alert: Enter your Email and instructions will be sent to you!
term_title: When using the website, you acknowledge and agree to the following:
term_content_line_1: The website does not specifically advertise or sell any products. It provides a service that enables users to create and manage their own advertisements on the website.
term_content_line_2: You commit to adhering to the teachings of Islamic law and general etiquette in all your posts.
term_content_line_3: You will not use an inappropriate username.
term_content_line_4: You will not advertise using multiple accounts on the website.
term_content_line_5: You will ensure the accuracy of information provided during registration, such as contact numbers, email addresses, or any other details.
term_content_line_6: You will adhere to the website's sections and post each advertisement in the appropriate category, refraining from adding links to other websites unless it serves the purpose of the advertisement.
term_content_line_7: You will refrain from posting non-serious requests or offers and from publishing advertisements unrelated to buying and selling within the website's scope.
term_content_line_8: You will not undervalue or disrespect members' advertisements.
term_content_line_9: You will not bid on a specific advertisement using multiple accounts.
term_content_line_10: Accounts that remain unused for a full year will be deleted.
term_content_line_11: Business transactions occur directly between members without any liability on the website. The website warns against money transfers and advises direct interaction between the parties involved.
term_content_line_12: The website management receives a fee for the type of advertisement published through the website, and the advertiser is obligated to pay it. The responsibility for this fee lies with the advertiser, and the website management has the right to claim it.
term_content_line_13: The website management reserves the right to change the value of advertisements at any time.
term_content_line_14: The website may update, modify, add, or delete any of the provisions of this agreement.
term_content_line_15: By accepting the terms of the website's terms of use, you signify your agreement and commitment to all the provisions of this agreement. Any violation of these provisions gives the website management the right to impose an appropriate penalty.
term_content_line_16: You bear full legal responsibility for all your posts before official authorities, without any liability on the website.
